dmca.title: Copyright infringement of Quibs material
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Peter Styles [mailto:peter_styles@msn.com] 
Sent: Saturday, November 13, 2004 9:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: will@jones-cliffe.freeserve.co.uk
Subject: Copyright infringement of Quibs material

Dear Sirs

I understand that you are the hosts for sites which contain material 
originally held on the Quibs.com and Quibs.co.uk websites.

Iwill be sending a formal written notification to you shortly to confirm a 
serious breach of my copyright. The infringement involves the publisher of 
the 123Quiz.net website (Mr Will Jones) and I have been in touch with him. 
Whilst removing some links, he has continued to publish my work, much of 
which was never previously in the public domain. He has no authority to use 
my work and, in my opinion, is in breach of UK copyright law.

I am currently in the process of initiating legal action against Mr Jones, 
and a claim for damages, but, in the meantime, I would be grateful if you 
would ensure that all material relating to Quibs, and links to any such 
material, is removed from the sites mentioned above.

Yours Faithfully

Peter W Styles
